DOC.brief_title: Influence Caffeine HRV Exercise Performance Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct placebo-controlled , double-blind randomise study protocol . Every subject undergo three test session sport medicine Nottwil . At first visit , investigator check subject fitness use health questionnaire specific question disease family health history . Additionally , subject perform maximal exercise test ( ramp protocol arm crank ergometer ) measure maximal oxygen uptake , maximal heart rate maximal power output . After little break , subject perform familiarization trial arm crank ergometer . They perform exactly test perform later two test session . Minimum two day later subject visit sport medicine Nottwil first test session . At first , answer specific question sleep , recent training , recent nutritional intake actual health condition . Afterwards , lie 10min rest 9min blood pressure measure . With heart rate monitor HRV measure 5 min supine position afterwards 6 min sit position . Metronomic breathing ( 15x/min ) mandatory simulate metronome . During HRV measurement also tidal volume measure . As first HRV measurement session finish , blood withdrawal take measure catecholamine concentration . Then , measurement complete , supplement ( either caffeine placebo ) ingest gelatine capsule . After ingestion capsule , subject 40 min break read something relax . During 40 min physical activity ingestion nutrition prohibit . After 40min , second HRV measurement start . The process measurement exactly first HRV measurement . They lay 10min rest blood pressure measurement 9 min . Afterwards 5min HRV measurement supine position 6min measurement sit position . Tidal volume measure HRV measurement . When second HRV measurement session finish , second blood withdrawal take . That mean , one hour ingestion either placebo caffeine , catecholamine analyse second time . If blood take , warm start . After standardised warm lactate concentration blood analyse take 10 ul blood earlobe . The subject ask evaluate warm rate perceive exertion ( follow Borg scale ) . If everything order , 3min exercise test start . During test , respiratory parameter measure use Oxycon Pro device ( device measure oxygen consumption ) . Just finish 3 min exercising , second time lactate concentration measure rate exertion use Borg scale . After short 5min break third HRV measurement start . Again HRV measure 5min time supine position 6min time sit position . Tidal volume measure whole HRV measurement . With HRV measurement first test session finish second test session conduct least two day later randomise manner . The first session familiarization trial finish around 75 min . For two test session subject sport medicine around 2 hour . In follow chart , test session visually display . The administrated dose caffeine define 6mg per kg bodyweight subject . Caffeine fill gelatine capsule . Also placebo ( Mannitol ) fill gelatine capsule subject ingest amount capsule supplement . 30 subject test total . In group 10 subject participate . That mean 10 healthy able-bodied subject , 10 tetraplegic ( C5-7 , American Impairment Score ( AIS ) A ) 10 paraplegic ( sub Th8 , AIS A ) subject test . As easy find 10 physically active , completely injured tetraplegic subject , number 10 subject sufficient pilot study . As investigator know previous study conduct disabled subject , level lesion one critical point . Therefore , investigator try include subject almost lesion level sensory motoric completely lesioned . This could aid u homogenous group different population . Inclusion criterion : healthy , non-smoking men , minimal 3x45min physical activity per week , tetraplegic ( C5 C7 ) paraplegic ( sub Th8 ) , complete lesion , 6 month rehabilitation program Exclusion : drug supplement influence heart rate variability , Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent document signature ( Appendix Informed Consent Form ) Age 18 60 year Healthy , nonsmoking men Tetraplegic subject : C57 , AIS A ( sensory motoric complete injury ) Paraplegic subject : sub Th8 , AIS A ( sensory motoric complete injury ) Min . 3x45min physical activity per week Contraindications class drug study , e.g . know hypersensitivity allergy class drug investigational product , Caffeine 12 hour test session Women Other clinically significant concomitant disease state ( e.g. , renal failure , hepatic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , etc . ) , Known suspect noncompliance , drug alcohol abuse , Inability follow procedure study , e.g . due language problem , psychological disorder , dementia , etc . participant , Participation another study investigational drug within 30 day precede present study , Previous enrolment current study , Enrolment investigator , his/her family member , employee dependent person , Diabetes Less 7 hour sleep night exercise test Not follow nutrition guideline ( standardised nutrition )
